feed.subtitle: Jawatan Kosong Hospital 2021. Malaysia hospital jobs vacancies 2021

entry.title: Sunway Medical Centre Sdn Bhd Vacancies Resident Medical Officer (ICU/CCU/Wards)

link.title: Sunway Medical Centre Sdn Bhd Vacancies Resident Medical Officer (ICU/CCU/Wards)

entry.content:
Sunway Medical Centre Sdn Bhd is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Resident Medical Officer (ICU/CCU/Wards) position. If you currently looking for new healthcare job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

Sunway Healthcare is part of the Sunway Group, one of Malaysia's largest conglomerates with core interest in property, construction, education and healthcare. The group currently runs Sunway Medical Centre, which is one of the largest private tertiary hospitals in the region with 636 beds and is accredited with the Australian Council on Healthcare Standards (ACHS). The group is also building 5 more hospitals in different cities in Malaysia which will complete in stages over the next four years.
Job Description:
  • Oversee care of critically ill neonates, pediatric and/or adult patients, under diverse range of post-operative, emergency admission and inpatient wards.
  • Assist in management of unstable patients in other inpatient areas eg. post major operations, fresh transferred out from critical care units, carry procedures and discharges.
  • Attend/assess verbal orders eg. sedation at night or radiology investigate, setting branula or taking blood samples.
  • Attending to code for patients in timely manner.
Requirements:
  • Possess a Bachelor of Medicine & Bachelor of Surgery (MBBS) preferably with additional Certificate in Critical Care medicine.
  • Has Advanced Cardiac Life Support (ACLS) Certificate.
  • Minimum 3 years of working experience in Anaesthesia and with critically ill and injured patients, CVVHD, IABP and ventilated patients.
  • Has training and experience or internal credentialing in airway management, cardiopulmonary resuscitation and emergency response.
  • Working knowledge of the intricacies of intensive and coronary care environment in tertiary acute medical centre.
  • Advanced resuscitation skills with the ability to intubate and insert central lines.
  • Preferably someone who has experience managing ICU/CCU/Wards.
In order to improve your well-being in the company, we provide the benefits below:
  • Contractual Bonuses
  • Good career progression as we are expanding further
  • Accessibility Assessment of Bus Rapid Transit near Bandar Sunway

Company Overview

Sunway Medical Centre Sdn Bhd is a multi-disciplinary acute tertiary care hospital, located within the integrated properties of Bandar Sunway. We have established many Centres of Excellence and take pride in providing the highest standard of care and treatment to our patients. A highly-accredited hospital, we are internationally certified with the Australian Council on Healthcare Standards (ACHS) and its laboratory is the first in Malaysia to be awarded the Westgard Sigma Verification and is also certified by Standards Malaysia (MS ISO 15189).

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream hospital job in Selangor.
Apply Online
entry.summary: Sunway Medical Centre Sdn Bhd is currently looking for suitable person to fill in the Resident Medical Officer (ICU/CCU/Wards) which positioned at Selangor

entry.title: Jawatan Kosong Tung Shin Hospital Terkini

link.title: Jawatan Kosong Tung Shin Hospital Terkini

entry.content:
Jawatan Kosong Tung Shin Hospital Terkini

Maklumat iklan kerja kosong yang ditawarkan oleh Tung Shin Hospital.

Calon yang berkelayakan dan memenuhi syarat-syarat yang ditetapkan sila memohon untuk mengisi kekosongan kerja seperti yang diiklankan dibawah sebelum Tarikh Tutup: 25 December 2020.

Kekosongan

  • Clinic Assistant/ Clerk

Kelayakan

Sekiranya anda, Warganegara Malaysia, berumur 18 tahun keatas yang berkelayakan dengan Ijazah, Diploma, Sijil Tinggi Persekolahan (SPM, STPM, “A” Level, Pre-U) atau Kelayakan Professional yang diiktiraf adalah di pelawa untuk memohon mengisi kekosongan jawatan di atas.

Selain itu calon juga perlulah mempunyai ciri-ciri berikut:

  • Berperwatakan menarik
  • Berpengetahuan
  • dan lain-lain (rujuk kelayakan permohonan di bawah)

Cara Permohonan

Klik pautan ‘Iklan Penuh Jawatan’ dibawah dan rujuk maklumat permohonan, syarat kelayakan dan tarikh tutup permohonan kerja tersebut. Calon yang disenaraikan pendek sahaja akan dipanggil temuduga.

Iklan Penuh Jawatan
entry.summary: Jawatan kosong Tung Shin Hospital terkini untuk kekosongan Clinic Assistant/ Clerk

entry.title: Klinik Pergigian Shuba Vacancies DENTAL ASSISTANT

link.title: Klinik Pergigian Shuba Vacancies DENTAL ASSISTANT

entry.content:
Klinik Pergigian Shuba is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for DENTAL ASSISTANT position. If you currently looking for new healthcare job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

  • Candidate must possess at least Primary/Secondary School/SPM/"O" Level, Higher Secondary/STPM/"A" Level/Pre-U, Diploma/Advanced/Higher/Graduate Diploma in Dentistry or equivalent.
  • At least 1 Year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position.
  • Required Skill(s): ADMIN, DSA
  • Preferably Entry Level specialized in Healthcare - Nurse/Medical Support & Assistant or equivalent.

Company Overview

THIS IS A DENTAL CLINIC WHERE WE PROVIDE TREATMENTS LIKE SCALING AND POLISHING, FILLING, DENTURE, ORTHO TREATMENT, TEETH WHITENING,ROOT CANAL TREATMENT, SURGERY.
THE WORKS HERE WILL BE LIKE REGISTER THE PATIENT, GIVING APPT TO PATIENTS, FIND LOCUM DOCTOR, WRITING RECEIPT AND MC, 
THE WORKS IN SURGERY ROOM WILL BE LIKE ASSISTING DR DURING SURGERY AND OTHER MINOR TREATMENT. STAFF SHOULD BE READY TO SUPPORT DR WITH COMPASSION AND CARE TOWARD PATIENTS.

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream hospital job in Selayang.
Apply Online
entry.summary: Klinik Pergigian Shuba is currently looking for suitable person to fill in the DENTAL ASSISTANT which positioned at Selayang

entry.title: BP Healthcare Group Vacancies Staff Nurse

link.title: BP Healthcare Group Vacancies Staff Nurse

entry.content:
BP Healthcare Group is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Staff Nurse position. If you currently looking for new healthcare job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

Job Description 
1. To perform the following diagnostic procedures on a patient:-
a. Resting ECG
b. Lung function test
c. Bone mineral density test
d. Blood pressure checking
e. Other necessary diagnostic tests
2. To assist the doctor in conducting stress ECG, including to prepare the patient, to screen the patient before the stress ECG, to monitor the test, to assist in resuscitation (if necessary) and etc.
3. To assist in promoting the health screening services to the patients and to answer the patients’ queries

4. To assist in venipuncture.
5. To assist the doctor in: -
a. administering injection and vaccination;
b. conducting pap smear;
c. explaining the test results;
d. being a chaperon;
e. other tasks as and when required.

6. To carry out various tasks assigned by the Management.
Requirements
  • Candidate must possess at least a Diploma, Advanced/Higher/Graduate Diploma, Nursing or equivalent.
  • At least 1 year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position.
  • Applicants must be willing to work in Kuantan.
  • Candidate must be hardworking 
  • Full-Time, Part-Time and Contract position(s) available.

Company Overview

Established in 1982, BP Healthcare has gone through over 35 years of innovation and transformation. Today, BP Healthcare Group has over 70 Laboratories, 50 Diagnostic centres, 50 Hearing Aids centres, 50 Dispensaries & Pharmacies, 50 Food and Industrial Testing centres, 5 Specialist/ Daycare Centres, 3 Dental Specialist clinics and 1 Eye Specialist Clinic.

With this network nationwide and still expanding, countless awards and credentials earned, BP Healthcare Group is certainly an undisputable leader in the Malaysia Healthcare Industry, serving more than 35 million customers over the last 35 years and still counting. We provide comprehensive health care in all discipline to cover the needs of Medical Practitioners, Hospitals and Corporate Clients. BP Healthcare Group has undergone aggressive expansion and transformation since its establishment in 1982.Over 30 years since its inception the group has grown from strength to strength alongside and in tandem with the nation's rapid growth. 
Find out more at http://www.bphealthcare.com or write in, with a detailed resume, stating preferred location, position applied for, current and expected salary, together with a non-returnable recent photograph and photocopies of your certificates. You may address it to:
The HR Department
B.P. Healthcare Group
Address : 
Lot 2, Jalan Pendaftar U1/54,
Section U1,
Temasya @ Glenmarie,
40150 Shah Alam
For interested applicants, kindly apply through Jobstreet ONLY. 
For further enquiries, please contact the respective Person In Charge under each job postings. 

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream hospital job in Pahang.
Apply Online
entry.summary: BP Healthcare Group is currently looking for suitable person to fill in the Staff Nurse which positioned at Pahang

entry.title: Sunway Pharmacy Vacancies Retail Pharmacist (Sunway Pharma Sdn Bhd)

link.title: Sunway Pharmacy Vacancies Retail Pharmacist (Sunway Pharma Sdn Bhd)

entry.content:
Sunway Pharmacy is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Retail Pharmacist (Sunway Pharma Sdn Bhd) position. If you currently looking for new healthcare job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

Sunway Pharmacy is a retail pharmacy chain in Malaysia owned by Sunway Group, one of Malaysia’s largest conglomerates with core interests in healthcare, property, construction and education. We are a growing retail chain with 13 outlets in multiple locations across Kuala Lumpur, Selangor, and Johor.
You may visit our Facebook page at https://www.facebook.com/sunwaypharma/ for more information on us.
We are looking for junior level pharmacists who have completed PRP that can start IMMEDIATELY.Job Responsibilities:
  • Dispense medication and process prescriptions.
  • Provide professional advice and service in pharmaceutical care as well as general advice on health and beauty care to customers.
  • Formulates pricing and markets merchandise by planning and implementing advertising, sales promotion, and display plans.
  • Provide leadership and guidance to the team of staff.
  • Any other ad-hoc tasks as and when assigned from time to time.
Job Requirements:
  • Must possess at least a Degree in Pharmacy.
  • Registered with the Pharmacy Board of Malaysia.
  • Working experience of at least 1 -2 years working experience in the related field.
  • Strong interpersonal, communication and customer service skills.
  • Must be computer literate (Microsoft Word, PowerPoint, Excel).
  • Able to work on shifts, weekends and public holidays.

Company Overview

Established in 2016, Sunway Pharmacy is a subsidiary of Sunway Group, one of Malaysia's largest conglomerates. Currently, we are a growing retail chain who aim to become a distinguished community pharmacy chain in Malaysia. We are passionate in ensuring excellent customer experience by providing top notch customer care and assistance.
At Sunway Pharmacy, we want our customers to get well and stay well. We not only provide quality products but we’re also at the frontline in educating the greater public on better health practices to suit current modern lifestyle.

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream hospital job in Selangor.
Apply Online
entry.summary: Sunway Pharmacy is currently looking for suitable person to fill in the Retail Pharmacist (Sunway Pharma Sdn Bhd) which positioned at Selangor

entry.title: BookDoc Vacancies Medical Lab Technologist
entry.content:
BookDoc is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Medical Lab Technologist position. If you currently looking for new healthcare job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

Requirements:

  • Minimum Diploma in Biochemistry, Medical Science or its equivalent.
  • At least 2-3 years of working experience.
  • Able to perform routine clinical laboratory tests done in hematology, chemistry, immunohematology, microbiology, immunology and coagulation.
  • PC literate, familiar with Microsoft Office and PPT preparation and handling.
  • Pleasant & mature disposition with good interpersonal skills to interact with people at all levels.
  • Good customer handling
  • Fast learner and able to work with minimum supervision.
  • Comfortable conversing in either English, Bahasa Melayu, Mandarin 
  • Ready to join a startup, open for a new learning experience and work in an IT/Tech/ Mobile App company.
  • Priority will be given to those who have working experience in handling PCR machine and validation of report

Responsibilities:

  • Decisions concerning sample collection and handling
  • Daily instrument maintenance and quality control
  • Sample testing
  • Collection and interpretation of data
  • Maintenance of accurate records and reporting of data
  • Knowledge of critical values
  • Help with the drafting of relevant FAQ & ticketing responses for Live Chat feature.
  • Serves as technical resource by participating in staff training; answering questions of other professionals; participating in educational opportunities; and tailor it to the requirement of the organization.

Only shortlisted candidate will be contacted for an interview.

Company Overview

Our company is a healthcare technology company which aim to make the healthcare ecosystem more efficient. Our company is backed by a diverse group of professionals from e-commerce entreprenuer, healthcare professionals, regulators, seasoned bankers and ICT professional. The company has grown its geographical footprint from Malaysia to Singapore, Hong Kong, Indonesia, and Thailand. We are in 5 countries and 17 cities.

The company is backed by a diverse group of investors from entrepreneurs to seasoned healthcare and insurance professionals, bankers, regulators as well as ICT professionals. It is available online at www.bookdoc.com, App Store, and Google Play Store.

BookDoc is a multi-award winning company that has won awards from CNBC as one of the World's Top 100 Startup Companies; ASEAN Summit (Business Awards 2019) as the most innovative startup in the region and also by Frost & Sullivan (2015-2019) as one of the most innovative healthcare technology startups in the region.

BookDoc on the net

BookDoc - CNBC's Top 100 Upstarts Globally: https://www.cnbc.com/2019/11/12/100-of-the-worlds-most-promising-start-ups-to-watch-in-2019.html

BookDoc on Forbes:  https://www.forbes.com/custom/2019/10/18/malaysia-moving-ahead/#bookdoc-gearing-up-for-digital-healthcare

BookDoc - ASEAN Summit (Business Awards) 2019: https://sites.bookdoc.com/2019/11/08/bookdoc-won-the-asean-business-award-2019-for-startup-category/

If you are looking for a fast moving dynamic company with the aim of making positive impact in people's life, please apply now!!

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream hospital job in Selangor.
Apply Online
entry.summary: BookDoc is currently looking for suitable person to fill in the Medical Lab Technologist which positioned at Selangor

entry.title: UM SPECIALIST CENTRE SDN. BHD. Vacancies Staff Nurse

link.title: UM SPECIALIST CENTRE SDN. BHD. Vacancies Staff Nurse

entry.content:
UM SPECIALIST CENTRE SDN. BHD. is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Staff Nurse position. If you currently looking for new healthcare job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

  • To perform usual and customary nursing duties and task as per job descriptions.
  • To maintain accurate, detailed reports and patients records.
  • To monitor patient’s progress, identify any changes, acting on those changes to ensure patient is safe and comfortable at all times.
  • Accountable and responsible to patient assigned. 
  • Understand the importance of prompt actions and on emergency and high risk situations
  • Update Sister On Call on patient’s progress and action taken
  • Maintain professionalism.
  • Candidate must possess at least Diploma, Bachelor’s Degree, Post Graduate Diploma, Professional Degree in Nursing or equivalent.
  • Registered with Malaysian Nursing Board
  • Valid Annual Practising Certificate
  • At least 3 year(s) of Nursing experience
  • Pleasant personality, positive attitude, flexible, fast learner & able to work independently.
  • Required language(s): Bahasa Malaysia and English. Other language is an added advantage
  • A self-motivated team player, discipline, able to work independently under pressure and tight schedule.
  • Good sense of responsibility
  • Work closely with other departments

Company Overview

UM Specialist Centre (UMSC) is a tertiary, sub-specialized private healthcare provider established in year 2000 and located adjacent to University Malaya Medical Centre (UMMC). UMSC is part of an integrated regional healthcare hub with UMMC and the Faculty of Medicine of University Malaya which is the oldest medical school in Malaysia. UMSC is renowned for its exceptional medical expertise supported by the 100-year-old tradition and ethos of Care, Research and Education as well as a team of compassionate and altruistic healthcare team comprising of highly skilled Professors and Associate Professors. Using their specialized medical knowledge and warm personalized service as our core competencies, UMSC has grown into one of the most successful and dynamic healthcare provider in the country.

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream hospital job in Kuala Lumpur.
Apply Online
entry.summary: UM SPECIALIST CENTRE SDN. BHD. is currently looking for suitable person to fill in the Staff Nurse which positioned at Kuala Lumpur

entry.title: Skin Town Vacancies Aesthetic Doctor
entry.content:
Skin Town is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Aesthetic Doctor position. If you currently looking for new healthcare job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

  • Knowledge and experience of medical aesthetics procedures ie Botox/ thread lifts/ dermal fillers/ laser procedures/ microdermabrasion/ peels etc.
  • Able to provide professional opinions and suggestion to patients on the aesthetic treatments.
  • Keeping up to the latest technology and research on aesthetic industries.
  • Working experience specifically in the aesthetic field
  • Preferably Junior Executive specialized in Healthcare - Doctor/Diagnosis or equivalent.
  • Candidate will act as a Other Medical specialist for this job position.
  • Professional Certificate, LCP, MMC or equivalent. 
  • Working place: Mid Valley

WHY JOIN US

  • No need to work on shifts.
  • Excellent work- life balance
  • Very attractive salaries that commensurate with work experience.
  • We provide opportunities for career advancement within the company

Company Overview

Skin Town Beauty and Aesthetics is the Korea Concept Beauty Salon based in Malaysia. We are mainly servicing top quality Skin Care and Cosmetics products of Korea concept. We are dedicated to be the main player of Korea Beauty in the market and introduce up trended Korea beauty concept and skin care to our customers.

Our customers will always enjoy the new buying experience throughout our outlets. We provide Korea HanBang Aesthetic (Traditional Herb) using our most trusted Skin Care Brand:

Awarded KOREAN Brand Power Index # 1

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream hospital job in Kuala Lumpur.
Apply Online
entry.summary: Skin Town is currently looking for suitable person to fill in the Aesthetic Doctor which positioned at Kuala Lumpur
